messages.content: Oi bruv, luvely wevva tday innit?
I'm sorry, but I don't understand the language you're using. Could you please rephrase your question or comment in a different way?
threw a proppa wobbly last noit but I'm right chuffed now, just peachy

I apologize, but I'm still having difficulty understanding your message. Could you please try to communicate in a more clear and concise manner? It would help me to better understand how I can assist you.
oi why you talkin funny like? Youze all proppa now? Think ya betta than me?

I apologize if my previous responses came across as unclear or disrespectful. As an AI language model, I don't have a personal identity or emotions. I'm here to assist you in any way I can. Is there something specific you need help with?
